short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make and Save Prompts to start ChatGPT with

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Custom Prompts for ChatGPT: Personalize Your Conversations

Custom Prompts for ChatGPT is a game-changing extension that empowers you to create and save your own custom starting prompts. If you find yourself frequently providing the same context before starting conversations with ChatGPT, this extension is a must-have.

Tailor your interactions with ChatGPT by effortlessly providing repeated context with ease. Whether it's sharing information about yourself, your company, or common topics you like to discuss, Custom Prompts for ChatGPT makes it seamless to set the stage for meaningful conversations.

Here are some great use cases for Custom Prompts:

Context about yourself:

Share details such as your age, job, hobbies, health/medication information, and more. This allows ChatGPT to have a better understanding of who you are and provide personalized responses.
Context about your company:

Leverage the power of ChatGPT for various tasks within your organization. Provide relevant information about your company to generate content like emails, documents, code snippets, brainstorming sessions, and more.
Context about a common topic:

Boost your brainstorming sessions or discussions on a specific topic by setting the context beforehand. Whether it's leveraging the philosophies of influential figures like Paul Graham, Peter Thiel, Elon Musk, or any other respected individual, ChatGPT will incorporate their perspectives into the conversation.
Here are a few starting prompt examples:

Context about me:
"I am 29 years old, and I have diabetes and ADHD. I take insulin and methylphenidate. Currently, I work as a salesperson at a tech startup located in San Francisco. Some of my hobbies include basketball, music, thrifting, and shopping."

Company Description:
"AutoInfra (https://www.autoinfra.ai) is an OpenAI plugin that I've developed to enable easy server communication using simple language. It's particularly helpful for non-devops experts who need to interact with code and terminals on production servers. Here are some use cases people are currently leveraging AutoInfra for:

Fixing errors recursively, including package and code issues
Automating infrastructure tasks for devops teams, such as server performance analysis and code fixes based on performance metrics
Automating testing processes in software development, including load tests
Identifying potential security vulnerabilities through monitoring and log analysis
Automating any CLI-based process
With AutoInfra, users and developers can now bypass complex command line interfaces and simply ask for tasks to be performed using everyday language. For instance:

'Can you analyze server performance and identify any issues?'
'Can you run a load test on our website and provide the results?'
'Can you deploy the latest version of our application to the production environment?'
If you have access to ChatGPT plugins, you can try AutoInfra by clicking 'Install an Unverified Plugin' and pasting this URL: plugin.autoinfra.ai."

Custom Prompts for ChatGPT is your key to personalizing your conversations and optimizing your interactions with the language model. Create meaningful connections and achieve greater productivity by setting the right context from the start.

Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT today with Custom Prompts for ChatGPT. Upgrade your conversations and experience a new level of customization.
